attributes.action: let england have its own national anthem of Jerusalem
attributes.additional_details: We the english people WANT a change in the national anthem for england ,let god save the queen be for great britain as a whole but let england have Jerusalem as the new anthem ,its in the church of england hymn book so therefore is part of england,wales and scotland have their own,so why can't we? Do something for this country for once and make us proud to be english once again. DO NOT DISMISS THIS ,WE WANT THIS AND AS YOUR VOTERS WE WILL SUCCEED IN GETTING THIS PASSED. ENGLISH AND PROUD.

rejection.details: Please see: Change the National Anthem to 'Jerusalem' published by the Dept for Culture Media and Sport.
